name: Gnomes & Goblins (preview)
description: Explore the interactive fantasy world of Gnomes & Goblins from Jon Favreau, produced by Wevr in collaboration with Reality One. Interact with an enigmatic resident and take a first step into the lucid dream of Gnomes & Goblins and its many realms and denizens.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 Processor: i5-4590 or equivalent Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 980 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Wevr strongly recommends that your Power Plan under Windows Power Options be set to "High performance" or equivalent
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Service Pack 1 Processor: i7-5930K or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 980 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Wevr strongly recommends that your Power Plan under Windows Power Options be set to "High performance" or equivalent
